home.title: Home
home.description: Free beginner guide to Ashtanga Yoga. Learn Mysore style practice, the Primary Series, Sanskrit counting, and find a shala near you.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Ashtanga Yoga
gettingStarted.description: Everything you need for your first Ashtanga class. Learn what Mysore style is, what to bring, what to expect, and how to find a teacher.

primarySeries.title: Ashtanga Primary Series Pose List
primarySeries.description: Complete list of all poses in the Ashtanga Primary Series (Yoga Chikitsa). Includes Sun Salutations, standing, seated, finishing poses, and mantras.

glossary.title: Ashtanga Yoga Glossary
glossary.description: Sanskrit yoga terms explained. Learn the meaning of asana, vinyasa, bandha, drishti, and other key Ashtanga Yoga vocabulary.

about.title: About Start Ashtanga
about.description: Start Ashtanga is a free, open source guide to traditional Ashtanga Yoga. Learn about our mission to make yoga accessible to everyone.

contributing.title: Contribute to Start Ashtanga
contributing.description: Help build a free Ashtanga Yoga resource. Contribute content, translations, code, or share your shala. Open source and community driven.
